title: Creating Folders in the App Drawer or Home Screen using Nova Launcher on Android

steps.title: Drag an app onto another app.
steps.content: Drag an app onto another app. Tap and hold an app on your Home screen until you can move it. Drag and drop it onto another app that you want to be in the same folder. A folder containing the two apps will be automatically created. Creating a folder on the Home screen does not require the purchase of Nova Launcher Prime. Only creating folders in the app drawer is a Prime-locked feature.

steps.title: Rename the folder.
steps.content: Rename the folder. Tap Edit Name with the folder open to change the folder's name.

steps.title: Add more apps.
steps.content: Add more apps. You can drag and drop more apps onto the folder to add them.

steps.title: Change your folder settings.
steps.content: Change your folder settings. You can change the color and layout of your folders from "Nova Settings". Open your App Drawer, tap "Nova Settings", and then tap the Folders option. You can change the way the preview icons are displayed as well as the background shape/color by tapping "Folder icon appearance". You can toggle and edit the app names/colors by tapping "Icon Layout".

steps.title: Head to "Nova Settings."
steps.content: Head to "Nova Settings." Do this by tapping and holding a blank space on your wallpaper then tapping the gear icon when it appears. You can also tap to open "Nova Settings" from the app drawer. Making folders in your App Drawer requires Nova Launcher Prime, which is a one-time upgrade purchase in Nova Launcher.

steps.title: Tap App drawer to configure the Nova App Drawer.
steps.content: Tap App drawer to configure the Nova App Drawer. It's usually the second option in the menu.

steps.title: Tap Drawer groups.
steps.content: Tap Drawer groups . You'll have to scroll down the menu to find this under the "Apps" section header.

steps.title: Tap + next to "Folders.
steps.content: Tap + next to "Folders. " This feature allows you to group and organize the apps in the app drawer, so if you're looking for an app, you can find it quickly.

steps.title: Customize your folder.
steps.content: Customize your folder. Give it a name and decide if you want the apps in this folder to also appear in the main tab, then tap Add . You can also change the color of the folder and text by tapping the circle next to the name. If you have the switch next to "Managed by Nova" on, then your launcher will pick an appropriate color scheme based on the surrounding colors.

steps.title: Tap ⋮ next to the folder you just made.
steps.content: Tap ⋮ next to the folder you just made. A menu will drop down.

steps.title: Tap Select apps.
steps.content: Tap Select apps . It's usually the option in the middle of the menu.

steps.title: Tap the apps you want to add to that folder.
steps.content: Tap the apps you want to add to that folder. A checkmark will appear in the selected apps.

steps.title: Open the app drawer and check your work.
steps.content: Open the app drawer and check your work. Your created folders will usually appear in the first slots when you open the app drawer. [1] X Research source
